imdb.title: Hand Shakers
imdb.plot: This is a story about "hand shakers", partners have superpoers and compete with similar people in a empty world called Ziggurat. Shows journey of protagonist who is Mecha geek , to meet god...Though is doesn't want to...

episodes.title: Conductor to Contact
episodes.plot: Tazuna is a young boy who loves to fix things. But his life takes an unexpected turn when he meets a girl who's lying on a hospital bed in an electronically locked lab. When he takes her hand, he finds out that he can never let go!

episodes.title: Lead by Red
episodes.plot: Tazuna and his new friend Koyori have a problem: If Tazuna lets go of Koyori's hand, she'll die! Can he take her home with him and explain to his parents why he now has to live with a girl? And how's he going to take a bath with her!?

episodes.title: Blade and Dagger
episodes.plot: Tazuna meets Chizuru and Hayate, the pair whose car he fixed on the day he met Koyori. They're workers for a major food corporation in the area, and they offer to treat him and Koyori to dinner as a thank you.

episodes.title: Live Lab
episodes.plot: Tazuna and Koyori must come up with a new name for battle while inside the Ziggurat to avoid being found in the real world.

episodes.title: Meet Yet
episodes.plot: Koyori gets separated from Tazuna, and because she doesn't have a cellphone, she doesn't have a way to get in touch with him. Fortunately, she's found by President Lily and her little brother Masaru, who take her to play a new game.

episodes.title: Emperor of Fortune
episodes.plot: Lily and Masaru insist on fighting Single Gear, despite Tazuna's fervent protests. The two of them use cards: Lily, her Tarots, and Masaru, his precious memories deck.

episodes.title: Festival and Carnival
episodes.plot: It's time for the School Festival, and Tazuna's class is in big trouble! Can Tazuna use the connections he's made so far to make everything right? And can Koyori learn to cook in time?

episodes.title: Sing a Sonic
episodes.plot: Tazuna and Koyori meet their next opponent: Kodama, a powerful idol singer who has defeated many other Hand Shakers. She and her producer are their toughest opponent yet, and together, they overwhelm Single Gear.

episodes.title: Finally Fairy
episodes.plot: Tazuna and Koyori battle Awaza Kodama a second time, and she's just as powerful as the first. Tazuna, and Single Gear, cannot hope to defeat her. Their only choice is to rely on Koyori's unseen strength.

episodes.title: Kitten Kitchen
episodes.plot: With the last of their foes vanquished, and Koyori now having the ability to talk, it's time for her and Tazuna to take up a part time job. It's a time to reflect on what's gone on so far, meet old friends, and ready the pair for the future.

episodes.title: Cocoon Cocoon
episodes.plot: Makihara once had a partner, and a boss. Together they researched the Ziggurat, and the mystery of Babel's revelations. But when a pair of Hand Shaker children were born, their lives changed.

episodes.title: Shake the Hands
episodes.plot: After years apart, Koyori faces her twin sister Mayumi in battle. Gears and cocoons collide in the Ziggurat to decide their fates.
